description: The Blueberry Hill Trail meanders through a popular urban blueberry picking patch in Sudbury. The climb is 46 vertical metres, providing a panoramic view of the city, including both Minnow and Ramsey lakes. The hiking trail includes a gazebo and various lookout points. May possibly see Silver Peak, Killarney in the distance, on a clear day.
directions: Trail Head: 17 T 503598 5149083   Located behind the Carmichael Arena, on Bancroft Drive Sudbury ON.
title: Blueberry Hill
